summary: This is a female Witch Doctor craftable armor and weapon mod. There are 7 craftable items. BBP. CBBE, UNPB, and 7base versions. Very Skimpy and original.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Witch Doctor BBP
Author: Edhildil
10,17,2013
ver1



[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

First of all, I made this armor and weapon the way I wanted to, to my specifications, That is why it has my name in the title. 
It is MY mod. please respect that.

If it is to skimpy or not lore friendly, or not good enough for you, simply skip this mod. 

If you are going to leave a comment please be intelligent about it. 

If you are having trouble with this mod please leave enough details so I can understand what is going on. 



This is a female Witch Doctor craftable armor and weapon mod. There are 7 craftable items: 

--------------------Name---------------------------------Item---------------Craft catagory---------
===============================================================================

Bonethwart of the Vapid Lich-------------------------Mace--------------------Iron
                       
Tainted Sabots of the Amphibious Nocturn--------Boots-------------------Leather

Horrid Mojo of the Diminished Soul-----------------Sheild------------------Leather

Taloned Molt of the Serpentine Gaze---------------Gloves------------------Leather

Cacaphony of the Restless Dead---------------------Outfit-------------------Leather

Severed Bauble of the Verile Hex-------------------Amulet-----------------Jewelry

Totem Visage of the Dream Horror-----------------Headdress-------------Leather


Although the weapon acts like a mace, it is under the sword catagory as far as perks and sheathing because of the node I used.

There are three versions, CBBE, UNPB, and 7base, all weighted for BBP. The armor is very skimpy.

The idea behind this is for a player class that is a mix of a Necromancer, Cleric, and a Warrior. Conjuration, Illusion, Restoration, One Handed and Blocking. A cool mix of dark spells and outright attacking. But you play how you want, that is just my interpretation and what I see. Could be cool in an adventure mod in some dank jungle. Or not. Maybe just a freaky companion. There is weirdos everywhere in skyrim. Enchant them how you see fit. Upgrade them with arcane smithing. Hang them on your mannaquins. It is all up to you.      

Textures I used in the screenshots:

Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946

Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666

UNP textures     
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


If you choose to use CBBE version you need CBBE compatible body textures

If you choose to use 7base version you need UNP compatible body textures

If you choose to use UNPB version you need UNP compatible body textures


CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling ( BBP animations)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888

XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800 
or a BBP skeleton such as included in CHSBC- BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod

I had the best results by manually installing these animations and skeletons, NMM freaks out alot.

 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location. 

copy/paste into Skyrim folder.


[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9233/uninstall.png[/img]

Delete the .esp file. 
Delete meshes/armor/edhildil/witchdoctor folder 
Delete meshes/weapons/edhildil/witchdoctor folder
Delete textures/armor/edhildil/witchdoctor folder



[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Dimon 99 for UNP body (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709)
  modified by Meister AKA neovinci (UNPB) 
CherryHotaling (BBP)
Edhildil (these new meshes and textures)
Bethesda (original meshes)

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2
Tes5edit (use the esp file in the main files)

Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.
Special thanks to my teachers, Apachii, A_TyPE 2 aka Speedbuster, Growlf, Robert, Coronerra, and others.
A shout out to 2pac4eva7, Acdale, Midas, and to my friends on nexus, my fans, and everyone who loves modding. Cheers! 

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod. Dimon99 requires a link as well for his work (UNP). Enjoy!
author: Edhildil
